trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows text box control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en tekstbokskontroll for Windows.

trans-unit.source: With the TextBox control, the user can enter text in an application.
trans-unit.target: Brukeren kan angi tekst i en applikasjon med TextBox-kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing and password character masking.
trans-unit.target: Denne kontrollen har flere funksjoner som ikke finnes i den standard Windows tekstbokskontrollen, inkludert redigering av flere linjer og passord tegn maskering.

trans-unit.source: Typically, a TextBox control is used to display, or accept as input, a single line of text.
trans-unit.target: En TextBox-kontroll brukes vanligvis til å vise, eller godta som inndata, en enkelt tekstlinje.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> properties to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A>Egenskaper for å aktivere flere linjer med tekst som skal vises eller angitt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.ScrollBars%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> properties to `true` to enable greater text manipulation in a multiline TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>egenskapene som skal `true` å aktivere større tekst redigeringen i en flere linjer TextBox-kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.AcceptsTab%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A> property to `true` to adjust the height of the TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>egenskapen `true` til å justere høyden på tekstboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Multiline%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can adjust the height by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan justere høyden ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can limit the amount of text entered into a TextBox control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A> property to a specific number of characters.
trans-unit.target: Du kan begrense hvor mye tekst som er angitt i en tekstboks-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>egenskapen til et angitt antall tegn.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.MaxLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: TextBox controls can also be used to accept passwords and other sensitive information.
trans-unit.target: Tekstbokskontroller kan også brukes til å godta passord og annen sensitiv informasjon.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property to mask characters entered in a single-line version of the control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>egenskapen masken tegn som er angitt i en enkelt linje versjon kontrollens.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A> property to enable the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the TextBox control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>til å aktivere brukeren om å skrive bare store og små bokstaver bare eller en kombinasjon av store og små bokstaver i tekstboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.CharacterCasing%2A>

trans-unit.source: To scroll the contents of the TextBox until the cursor (caret) is within the visible region of the control, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil rulle innholdet i tekstboksen til markøren (Synlig) er i området som er synlig for kontrollen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ScrollToCaret%2A>

trans-unit.source: To select a range of text in the text box, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For å velge et område med tekst i tekstboksen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict text from being entered in a TextBox control, you can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> event in order to validate each character entered in the control.
trans-unit.target: For å begrense teksten er angitt i en TextBox-kontroll, kan du opprette en hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>hendelsen for å validere hvert tegn som er angitt i kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: You can also restrict all entry of data in a TextBox control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også begrense alle oppføring med data i en TextBox-kontroll ved å angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Most of the functionality of the TextBox control is inherited from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase> class.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Mest funksjonaliteten i tekstboksen er arvet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase>

trans-unit.source: > > Using the TextBox control with visual styles enabled will cause the incorrect handling of surrogate fonts.
trans-unit.target: >> Bruker TextBox-kontroll med visuelle stiler aktivert, vil føre til feil håndtering av erstatning skrifter.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The parent container control defines the color and font settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Den overordnede beholderkontrollen definerer farge og skrift innstillingene for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om å trykke ENTER i flere linjer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontroll oppretter en ny tekstlinje kontrollens eller aktiveres standardknappen for skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen `false`, må brukeren trykke CTRL + ENTER for å opprette en ny linje i flere linjer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If there is no default button for the form, the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, regardless of the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen standardknappen for skjemaet, Opprett angi nøkkelen alltid en ny tekstlinje i kontrollen, uavhengig av verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis nøkkelen angi oppretter en ny tekstlinje i en flere linjer versjon av kontrollen. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis nøkkelen angi aktiverer standardknappen for skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egendefinert <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"> </xref> skal brukes når det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Use the AutoCompleteCustomSource, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av AutoCompleteCustomSource <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Egenskaper for å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>som automatisk er fullført inndata strenger ved å sammenligne prefikset registreres for prefikser for alle strenger i en opprettholdes kilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Kontroller der URL-adresser, filnavn eller kommandoer ofte registreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the AutoCompleteCustomSource property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use AutoCompleteCustomSource.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av egenskapen AutoCompleteCustomSource er valgfritt, men du må angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>egenskapen `CustomSource` for å kunne bruke AutoCompleteCustomSource.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Egenskaper sammen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Operativsystemet kan begrense antall egendefinerte strenger som kan vises samtidig.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> to use with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an option that controls how automatic completion works for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et alternativ som styrer hvordan automatisk fullføring fungerer for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, AutoCompleteMode, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, AutoCompleteMode, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Egenskaper for å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>som automatisk er fullført inndata strenger ved å sammenligne prefikset registreres for prefikser for alle strenger i en opprettholdes kilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Kontroller der URL-adresser, filnavn eller kommandoer ofte registreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>egenskapen er valgfritt, men du må angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>egenskapen `CustomSource` for å kunne bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the AutoCompleteMode and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> properties together.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke AutoCompleteMode og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>Egenskaper sammen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that it can display at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Operativsystemet kan begrense antall egendefinerte strenger som kan vises samtidig.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The following are the values.
trans-unit.target: Følgende er verdiene.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Appends the remainder of the most likely candidate string to the existing characters, highlighting the appended characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Tilføyer resten av den mest sannsynlige candidate strengen til de eksisterende tegnene, utheving føyer tegn.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Displays the auxiliary drop-down list associated with the edit control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Viser den ekstra rullegardinlisten tilknyttet redigeringskontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This drop-down is populated with one or more suggested completion strings.
trans-unit.target: Denne rullegardinlisten fylles ut med ett eller flere anbefalte fullføring strenger.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Appends both <xref uid="langword_csharp_Suggest" name="Suggest" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""></xref> options.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Tilføyer begge <xref uid="langword_csharp_Suggest" name="Suggest" href=""> </xref> og <xref uid="langword_csharp_Append" name="Append" href=""> </xref> alternativer.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref> Disables automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>Deaktiverer automatisk fullføring.

trans-unit.source: This is the default.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke en av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the source of complete strings used for automatic completion.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir kilden for fullført strenger som brukes for automatisk fullføring.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, and AutoCompleteSource properties to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>, og AutoCompleteSource egenskapene til å opprette en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>som automatisk er fullført inndata strenger ved å sammenligne prefikset registreres for prefikser for alle strenger i en opprettholdes kilde.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is useful for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nyttig for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Kontroller der URL-adresser, filnavn eller kommandoer ofte registreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: The use of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> property is optional, but you must set the AutoCompleteSource property to `CustomSource` in order to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>egenskapen er valgfritt, men du må sette egenskapen AutoCompleteSource til `CustomSource` for å kunne bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteCustomSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: You must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A> and AutoCompleteSource properties together.
trans-unit.target: Du må bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>og AutoCompleteSource egenskaper sammen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AutoCompleteSource does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AutoCompleteSource fungerer ikke i flere linjer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The operating system might limit the number of custom strings that can be displayed at once.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Operativsystemet kan begrense antall egendefinerte strenger som kan vises samtidig.

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllSystemSources" name="AllSystemSources" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllUrl" name="AllUrl" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileSystem" name="FileSystem" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_HistoryList" name="HistoryList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecentlyUsedList" name="RecentlyUsedList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The options are <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllSystemSources" name="AllSystemSources" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_AllUrl" name="AllUrl" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FileSystem" name="FileSystem" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_HistoryList" name="HistoryList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_RecentlyUsedList" name="RecentlyUsedList" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_CustomSource" name="CustomSource" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_None" name="None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the values of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke en av verdiene i <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AutoCompleteSource"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control modifies the case of characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen endrer tegntypen slik de er skrevet.

trans-unit.source: You can use the CharacterCasing property to change the case of characters as required by your application.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke egenskapen CharacterCasing endre tegntypen som kreves av programmet.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the case of all characters entered in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control used for password entry to uppercase or lowercase to enforce a policy for passwords.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel kan du endre tilfellet for alle tegn som er angitt i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollen som brukes for angivelse av passord til store eller små bokstaver for å bruke en policy for passord.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing"></xref> enumeration values that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control modifies the case of characters.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CharacterCasing"> </xref> nummereringsverdier som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen endrer tegntypen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_CharacterCasing.Normal" name="CharacterCasing.Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_CharacterCasing.Normal" name="CharacterCasing.Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som ikke er innenfor området med gyldige verdier for opplistingen ble tilordnet til egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Henter oppretting av nødvendige parameterne når kontrollen referansen opprettes.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> som inneholder de nødvendige oppretting parameterne når håndtaket for kontrollen som er opprettet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose` metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` parameteren er `true`, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>referanser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Frigi ressurser både administrerte og uforvaltede; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is an input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte nøkkelen er en inndata- eller en bestemt nøkkel som krever forhåndsbehandling.

trans-unit.source: The IsInputKey method returns `true` when `keyData` includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> value and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsInputKey returnerer `true` når `keyData` inneholder den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>verdi og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AcceptsReturn%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: One of the key's values.
trans-unit.target: En av de nøkkelverdier.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is an input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den angitte nøkkelen er en inndata nøkkelen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om det er flere linjer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A> does not work on multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>fungerer ikke i flere linjer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>Kontroller.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.AutoCompleteSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the font is changed, any indentation that you have defined does not appear.
trans-unit.target: Når skriften endres, vises ikke alle innrykk som er definert.

trans-unit.source: To get indentation, set Multiline to `true` and override WM_SETFONT without calling the base class so that SETMARGINS is not called.
trans-unit.target: Innrykk angi flere linjer `true` og overstyre WM_SETFONT uten å kalle basisklassen slik at SETMARGINS ikke kalles.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen er flere linjer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColorChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnBackColorChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnBackColorChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The OnFontChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnFontChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: When the user selects text in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, the control saves the selection.
trans-unit.target: Når brukeren velger tekst i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontroll, kontrollen lagrer utvalget.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control gets focus, the selection is the same as when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> loses focus.
trans-unit.target: Når en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kontrollen får fokus, utvalget er den samme som når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>mister fokus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> gets focus for the first time, the entire text is selected.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>henter Konsentrer for første gang, hele teksten er valgt.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to mask characters of a password in a single-line <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tegnet som brukes til masketegnene i et passord i en enkelt linje <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> property has precedence over the PasswordChar property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>egenskapen har prioritet over egenskapen PasswordChar.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by PasswordChar is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>er satt til `true`standard system passord tegnet brukes og alle tegn som er angitt av PasswordChar ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the PasswordChar property is set, cut and copy actions in the control using the keyboard cannot be performed.
trans-unit.target: Klipp ut og Kopier handlinger kontrollens tastaturet kan ikke utføres når egenskapen PasswordChar angis.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because PasswordChar, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>er i Passordmodus for fordi PasswordChar, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>er `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>er i begrenset modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.UseSystemPasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: I denne modusen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>er deaktivert, men gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>bufres slik at den kan gjenopprettes hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>noen gang blir ubegrenset.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>er et vanlig scenario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>er skyggelagt når kontrollen er i begrenset modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: Fra designer perspektiv i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>verdien som vises, er den faktiske verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: The character used to mask characters entered in a single-line <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Tegnet som brukes til masketegn som er angitt i en enkelt linje <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Set the value of this property to 0 (character value) if you do not want the control to mask characters as they are typed.
trans-unit.target: Angi verdien for denne egenskapen til 0 (tegnverdien) Hvis du ikke vil kontrollen masken tegn slik de er skrevet.

trans-unit.source: Equals 0 (character value) by default.
trans-unit.target: Er lik 0 (tegnverdien) som standard.

trans-unit.source: Sets the selected text to the specified text without clearing the undo buffer.
trans-unit.target: Angir den merkede teksten for den angitte teksten uten å tømme Angre-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Unlike setting <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, Paste does not affect the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: I motsetning til innstillingen <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>, Lim inn påvirker ikke utklippstavlen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.SelectedText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text to replace.
trans-unit.target: Teksten du vil erstatte.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en nøkkel for kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: New in 4.6.1.
trans-unit.target: Nytt i 4.6.1.

trans-unit.source: In previous versions, the Ctrl-A shortcut key in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> failed to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties were both set to `true.`.
trans-unit.target: I tidligere versjoner, Ctrl-A hurtigtasten i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>kan ikke velge alle text Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>ble begge egenskapene til `true.`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: This method enables the Ctrl-A shortcut key to select all text when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> properties are both set to `true.` Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.0 through 4.6 can take advantage of this method by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" /> ``` Applications targeting .NET Framework versions 4.6.1 or newer can opt out of this behavior by adding the following to the `<runtime>` section of the app.config file: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=true" /> ``` > [!NOTE] > If the app.config file already contains an `AppContextSwitchOverrides` key, merge the new key value into the existing key.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden aktiverer hurtigtasten Ctrl-A til å velge alle text Når <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A>er begge egenskapene til `true.` programmer har .NET Framework-versjonene 4.0 via 4.6 kan dra nytte av denne metoden ved å legge til følgende for å den `<runtime>` delen av filen app.config: ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" /> ``` programmer har .NET Framework-versjonene 4.6.1 eller nyere kan velge utenfor dette problemet ved å legge til følgende for å den `<runtime>` delen av app.config-filen : ```xml <AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=true" /> ``` > [!NOTE] > Hvis app.config-filen inneholder allerede en `AppContextSwitchOverrides` nøkkel, slå sammen nye nøkkelverdien til den eksisterende nøkkelen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ShortcutsEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel `<AppContextSwitchOverrides value = "oldKey=oldValue;Switch.System.Windows.Forms.DoNotSupportSelectAllShortcutInMultilineTextBox=false" />`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, referert som representerer vinduet meldingen for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the shortcut key to process.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> verdier som representerer hurtigtasten for å behandle.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the command key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kommandoen nøkkelen ble behandlet av kontrollen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which scroll bars should appear in a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir som rulle stolpene skal vises i flere linjer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A> property is set to `true`, regardless of the value of the ScrollBars property.
trans-unit.target: Vannrett Rull stolper vises ikke hvis det <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>er satt til `true`, uavhengig av verdien for egenskapen ScrollBars.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.WordWrap%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"></xref> enumeration values that indicates whether a multiline <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control appears with no scroll bars, a horizontal scroll bar, a vertical scroll bar, or both.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBars"> </xref> nummereringsverdier som angir om flere linjer <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen vises med rullefeltet stolper, vannrette rullefeltet, loddrette rullefeltet eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScrollBars.None" name="ScrollBars.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScrollBars.None" name="ScrollBars.None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som ikke er innenfor området med gyldige verdier for opplistingen ble tilordnet til egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som er forbundet med denne kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvordan teksten justeres i en <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> to match the layout of text on your form.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne egenskapen til å justere tekst i en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>som samsvarer med oppsettet for tekst i skjemaet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A> property to `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment.
trans-unit.target: Hvis alle kontrollene er plassert på høyre side av skjemaet, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>egenskapen `HorizontalAlignment.Right`, og teksten vil bli justert etter høyre side av kontrollen i stedet for standard venstre justering.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.TextAlign%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> nummereringsverdier som angir hvordan teksten justeres i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlignment.Left" name="HorizontalAlignment.Left" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlignment.Left" name="HorizontalAlignment.Left" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that is not within the range of valid values for the enumeration was assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som ikke er innenfor området med gyldige verdier for opplistingen ble tilordnet til egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*>egenskapen er endret.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.TextAlign*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control should appear as the default password character.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om teksten i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen skal vises som standard passord tegn.

trans-unit.source: The UseSystemPasswordChar property has precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen UseSystemPasswordChar har prioritet den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: Whenever the UseSystemPasswordChar is set to `true`, the default system password character is used and any character set by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Når UseSystemPasswordChar er satt til `true`standard system passord tegnet brukes og alle tegn som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in password mode because <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, UseSystemPasswordChar, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>er i Passordmodus for fordi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A>, UseSystemPasswordChar, eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>er `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>er i begrenset modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is disabled, but the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is cached so that it can be restored if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> ever becomes unrestricted.
trans-unit.target: I denne modusen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>er deaktivert, men gjeldende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>bufres slik at den kan gjenopprettes hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>noen gang blir ubegrenset.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: Toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A> is a common scenario.
trans-unit.target: Aktivering av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>er et vanlig scenario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> is shadowed while the control is in restricted mode.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>er skyggelagt når kontrollen er i begrenset modus.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: From the designer perspective, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode> value shown is the actual value.
trans-unit.target: Fra designer perspektiv i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>verdien som vises, er den faktiske verdien.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the text in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"></xref> control should appear as the default password character; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis teksten i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TextBox"> </xref> kontrollen skal vises som standard passord tegnet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Behandler Windows meldinger.

trans-unit.source: A Windows Message object.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for Windows-melding.
